original_title: 工業哀歌バレーボーイズ
overview: The story follows the risque misadventures of three students named Akagi, Miyamoto, and Taniguchi, known by others as the Numa-Kō 3 Baka Trio ("The Asanuma Technical High School Idiot Trio"). The trio start a second volleyball team at their school in a misguided attempt to be popular.
title: Kougyou Aika Volley Boys
